short_description_localized.en: Displaying contemporary decor with New York City flair, these elegantly-appointed second-floor suites have 465-562 square feet of living space and all the comforts of home.
short_description_localized.es: Displaying contemporary decor with New York City flair, these elegantly-appointed second-floor suites have 465-562 square feet of living space and all the comforts of home.

description_localized.en:
Make your stay extraordinary with a City Lights Suite, featuring the chic New York City style you would expect from a Manhattan boutique hotel. 

Reserve one of our elegantly-appointed City Lights Suites, where you can spread out and relax in 465-562 square feet of comfortable living space. Located on the second floor, these well-appointed accommodations feature a kitchenette, contemporary decor and first-class amenities.
description_localized.es:
Make your stay extraordinary with a City Lights Suite, featuring the chic New York City style you would expect from a Manhattan boutique hotel. 

Reserve one of our elegantly-appointed City Lights Suites, where you can spread out and relax in 465-562 square feet of comfortable living space. Located on the second floor, these well-appointed accommodations feature a kitchenette, contemporary decor and first-class amenities.

images.name: City-Lights-Suite--City-Lights-Bedroom
images.caption: City Lights Bedroom
images.description: This suite includes a king size bed and large window.
images.alt: A king sized bed to the right of a large window. There is light fixture in between and room amenity tray on the bed.

images.name: City-Lights-Suite--City-Lights-Living-Room
images.caption: City Lights Living Room
images.description: This living room includes a TV, dresser, armless chair, and coffee table.
images.alt: This living room includes a dresser beneath a suspended TV on the right wall. In the corner, to the left of the TV and right of a large window, an armless chair. In front of the dresser sits a coffee table.

images.name: City-Lights-Suite--City-Lights-Suite-Bath
images.caption: City Lights Suite Bath
images.description: This bathroom includes a shower stall and large countertop with a sink.
images.alt: On the right wall, a large shower stall enclosed with a glass door. To the left, a long counter top with a sink on the right side. A large mirror sits above the counter and shelf below. Towels can be found on the bottom shelf.

images.name: City-Lights-Suite--City-Lights-Suite---Kitchenette
images.caption: City Lights Suite - Kitchenette
images.description: Kitchenette has a counter with sink area, coffee maker along with coffee and tea condiments.
images.alt: Kitchenette has a counter with sink area, coffee maker along with coffee and tea condiments.
